channel.title: Making Safe Zones In Pimpscape
channel.description:
I want to make an area a non pk area how do i do that?
Plz help me i need it step by step aswell sorry. ;D ;)

item.title: Making Safe Zones In Pimpscape

item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Yeah, that works.
And you’re sig is so funny! ROFL

Quote from: rstomrs on March 21, 2007, 10:12:26 AM Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .

I saw the soltution somewhere but i don’t know where anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Making Safe Zones In Pimpscape
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

Step 1:
Search for this in you client.JAVA file

public boolean nonWild()

you should see under it this line or a line simalar

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 )heightLevel == 1)

lets say you want to make the fountain next to the east ban a safe zone you start here at the south-west of the area you want as a safe zone:

see the co-ord says 3236, 3432. you use the first coord(the x axis) as the first co-ord in the client.java.

e.g:

if((absX >= 3236 && absX <= xaxis && absY >= yaxis && absY <= yaxis )

and the second co-ord(the Yaxis) as the first y axis

if((absX >= 3236 && absX <= xaxis && absY >= 3423 && absY <= yaxis)

and for the other axis walk to the north east corner

see the axis 3241, 3437

the x axis there is the 2nd in the client and the y is the second in cline so all together it should look like

if((absX >= 3236 && absX <= 3241 && absY >= 3423 && absY <= 3437)

and would u look at that, the fountain is now safe.

Read full topic
